scripts.down: sed -i '1s|# /*   /maintenance.html   200|/*   /maintenance.html   200|' public/_redirects && sed -i "s|<!-- MAINTENANCE_MODE.*-->|<!-- MAINTENANCE_MODE $(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%MZ) -->|" public/maintenance.html && sed -i '/# ==== BEGIN_MAINTENANCE/,/# ==== END_MAINTENANCE/s/^# //' netlify.toml && git add public/_redirects public/maintenance.html netlify.toml && git commit -m "chore: site down for maintenance" && git push origin main
scripts.up: sed -i '1s|/*   /maintenance.html   200|# /*   /maintenance.html   200|' public/_redirects && sed -i "s|<!-- MAINTENANCE_MODE .*-->|<!-- MAINTENANCE_MODE -->|" public/maintenance.html && sed -i '/==== BEGIN_MAINTENANCE/,/==== END_MAINTENANCE/{/BEGIN_MAINTENANCE/!{/END_MAINTENANCE/!s/^/# /}}' netlify.toml && git add public/_redirects public/maintenance.html netlify.toml && git commit -m "chore: site live again" && git push origin main
scripts.purge: set -a && source .env && set +a && curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/$CF_ZONE_ID/purge_cache" -H "Authorization: Bearer $CF_API_TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"purge_everything":true}'
scripts.down:purge: npm run down && npm run purge
scripts.up:purge: npm run up && npm run purge
